show.subtitle: Mickey Huff is co-host of the Project Censored Show with former Project Censored director Dr. Peter Phillips. It airs on the progressiveradionetwork.com out of New York City
show.title: Project Censored

title: Project Censored
content:
Co-hosts Mickey Huff and Peter Phillips interview Christina Chan, Outreach Director for Rising Sun Energy Center, and… Rebecca Wilson, Community Outreach Manager- Marin County on the topic—Building Healthy Communities through Climate Solutions and Green Career Pathways.
We will have a live update by Michael Levitin from the Occupy Caravan meetings in Philadelphia and  at the bottom of the hour we’ll hear Work Week Radio with Steve Zeltzer.
Durng the 2nd half of the program we will interview Sara Flounders Co-coordinator of the International Action Center regarding US imperialism’s latest threats of war against Syria and Iran.
